tips.description: Being a programmer is all about learning how to search for the answers to your questions. By learning to Google things effectively, you'll save a lot of development time.
It's better to let your team know a task will take three weeks and deliver in two than the other way around. By under promising and over delivering, you'll build trust.

tips.tip: Be nice to your designers; they're your friends
tips.description: Designers provide solutions to user pain points. Learn from them and work cohesively to build effective products.
Find someone you can learn from and bounce ideas off of. Coding Coach is a great place to get started if you need a technical mentor!
